hymn.title: As now we breathe the heav'nly air

layout.singingstanza: As now we breathe the heav'n -- ly air, The fra -- grance from a -- bove; May ev -- ery soul put off the flesh Each spir -- it fill with love.

lyrics.stanza: As now we breathe the heav'nly air, The fragrance from above; May every soul put off the flesh Each spirit fill with love.
We all must take Your cross as guide, To all Your will be true; Thus only draw we closer to Each other, and to You.
